choices: Rarity and Sweetie Belle make it the castle
12413233.content: "Are you sure that this will work Rarity?" Asked Sweetie Belle as she and her sister headed to Twilight's castle. "Of course Sweetie Belle. Twilight is more than capable of pulling off such a task." Replied Rarity. Both ponies were referring to a spell that Twilight came across recently, that allowed younger ponies to be unbirthed by a family member. As long as they didn't have a cutie mark yet. When Rarity and Sweetie Belle heard about it, they asked Twilight if she would use the spell on them, which of course, Twilight agreed.
12413233.title: Rarity and Sweetie Belle

124132331.content:
Rarity and Sweetie Belle make their way to the castle with little difficulty. The two of them a relatively quiet as they make their way inside the building. The two of them say nothing to each other as their hoof steps echo off the walls around them, each of them silently thinking of what was about to happen, what they were about to undertake. It wasn't long before they came up to where Twilight was, apparently Twilight had taken the liberty of getting things set up for them.

"Hello girls, so. You're ready for this then? After I complete the spell there's no going back. So if you want to back out, now's your chance." Twilight said as she looked at both of them.

Rarity and Sweetie Belle seemed to think for a moment, if this is really what they wanted, then they turned to face each other, locking eyes, the two of them shared a moment together, a moment of understanding, and they then both turned to Twilight.

"We're ready." They said in unison.

Twilight nodded her head quietly as her horn began to spark with magic. Over the course of a few moments the steady glow of her horn turned into a brightly burning light, the magic she was building could be felt in the air, practically charging it with energy. Once Twilight finished preparing she extended her magic to Sweetie Belle, enveloping her in a lavender glow, the filly lifted off of the ground a bit.

Sweetie Belle didn't know what to expect as the magic touched her, but it felt just like being lifted up like normal, with magic anyway, but soon that familiar tingle of levitation grew, not in a bad way, but it felt like her entire body was constricting. Like she was being gently squeezed, not hard, or painfully, but enough to notice.

Rarity watched as her little sister became even smaller, watching the years fade away from Sweetie Belle until she looked like a newborn foal. At which point the magical embrace that enveloped Sweetie Belle shot a tendril of magic at Rarity, more specifically the tendril of magic worked it's way into Rarity's vagina, causing Rarity to shiver a little bit at the sensation, her eyes fluttering a bit as it happened. The magic made it's way to the mare's womb, where it began to enlarge the space, slowly stretching it out in order to make room for its new occupant. Thankfully it didn't feel much worse that having herself spread a bit wide to Rarity.

Then Sweetie Belle gently floated her way through the tendril of magic, which dissipated as Sweetie went through it. Then she entered Rarity, and in a few moments Sweetie Belle was gently laid inside of Rarity, the magic staying for a few moments to connect everything properly, once the magic was done and it faded away, Rarity could feel the pressure of her sister lying inside of her own body. It was a sudden thing to take in as she steadied herself.

Twilight looked up at Rarity and said, "Well, if everything goes accordingly, you should be giving birth to Sweetie Belle in.."
124132331.title: Rarity and Sweetie Belle make it the castle

info.description:
Please don't be afraid to add chapters to this story.

One of the characters from My Little Pony FiM gets unbirthed by their friends either willingly or unwillingly. You can choose anypony from the show that you want, including the ponified and human versions of anyone introduced in the movie; My Little Pony: Equestria Girls, though they will be ponified in this story. No 'Humans are in Equestria and are transformed only by being unbirthed'.

Things that will not be allowed for this story:
1. death.
2. gay stuff (ex.: Pip gets CV by Big Mac.)
3. In accordance with rule 2, CV (cock vore in case you are wondering.)
4. graphic or gory stuff like "There was blood splattering everywhere as he/she entered the womb."
5. digestion (Age regressed to stage of an egg is ok though.)
6. Characters from My Little Pony Generations 1, 2, or 3.
7. cursing
8. using alcohol
9. fighting (struggling while being unbirthed is okay, but no pony gets hurt.)
10. ending storylines short.
11. making chapters with a sentence like "They went through the door and then...." with nothing before or after it and going straight to the next selection. (I will allow chapters like "Do they get unbirthed head first or feet first" and then you go to the next selection.)

Notices for this story:
1. Do not end the story after any of the ponies have been unbirthed. Keep the story going.
2. This will take place in the Pony world of My Little Pony FiM. No transporting to the real world or to the world of My Little Pony: Equestria Girls.
3. You can bring humans from either of the other worlds I just mentioned. You can also make your own characters for this story.
4. This story can also be used for anyone who is a fan of age regression and putting the MLP characters in diapers.
5. I will set up for a story line where you are the one who gets unbirthed, and use first person P.O.V.
6. I will allow sex scenes as long as they don't get very graphic and it will be from the unbirthed pony's point of view. (I will allow cutscenes taking place with the unbirther and other ponies.)
7. Be sure to keep options open so other writers have ways to spread their own storyline while branching off yours.

Things allowed for this story:
1. Age regression (any stage before or after birth is fine.)
2. Transformation of pony type and/or gender. (this includes humans from MLP: EG turned to ponies and/or have their gender changed. No herms in this story though.)
3. Diapers
4. Breastfeeding
5. Baby equipment
6. Sex (as long as if someone is unbirthed they don't get hurt.)
7.Shrinking anypony, including yourself if you are the pony in a first Person P.O.V storyline.
8.Dragon characters are allowed as well.

Please email me if you have requests to do something I have not listed and I will see if I want to allow it. I will delete any chapters that are badly written on purpose, have extremely poor grammer and spelling (I will go easy on those who have trouble typing.), have broken my set of rules. I may update my rules and notices if need be. Please add as many chapters as possible. Thank you and enjoy reading and writing.
